revision.text:
'''Eggs''' are items that contain Pokémon. Eggs can be obtained in two ways: buying them from [[shops]] or breeding level 100 Pokémon. Getting the egg through the latter method will boost the bred Pokémon's attack by 25% of its base attack. == Shop Egg Pool == In the following tables, '''bolded''' names indicate Pokémon that can only be obtained in their respective regions by hatching shop eggs. === '''[[Kanto]]''' === {| class="wikitable" |- ! [[Fire Egg|Fire]] !! [[Grass Egg|Grass]] !! [[Water Egg|Water]] !! [[Electric Egg|Electric]] !! [[Fighting Egg|Fighting]] !! [[Dragon Egg|Dragon]] |- | [[File:Charmander.png|40px]] '''Charmander''' || [[File:Bulbasaur.png|40px]] '''Bulbasaur''' || [[File:Squirtle.png|40px]] '''Squirtle''' || [[File:Magnemite.png|40px]] Magnemite || [[File:Hitmonchan.png|40px]] '''Hitmonchan''' || [[File:Dratini.png|40px]] '''Dratini''' |- | [[File:Growlithe.png|40px]] Growlithe || [[File:Oddish.png|40px]] Oddish || [[File:Lapras.png|40px]] '''Lapras''' || [[File:Pikachu.png|40px]] Pikachu || [[File:Hitmonlee.png|40px]] '''Hitmonlee''' || [[File:Dragonair.png|40px]] Dragonair |- | [[File:Ponyta.png|40px]] Ponyta || [[File:Bellsprout.png|40px]] Bellsprout || [[File:Staryu.png|40px]] Staryu || [[File:Voltorb.png|40px]] Voltorb || [[File:Machop.png|40px]] Machop || [[File:Dragonite.png|40px]] Dragonite |- | [[File:Vulpix.png|40px]] Vulpix || [[File:Tangela.png|40px]] Tangela || [[File:Psyduck.png|40px]] Psyduck || [[File:Electabuzz.png|40px]] Electabuzz || [[File:Mankey.png|40px]] Mankey ||
--- |} === '''[[Johto]]''' === {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! [[Fire Egg|Fire]] !! [[Grass Egg|Grass]] !! [[Water Egg|Water]] !! [[Electric Egg|Electric]] !! [[Fighting Egg|Fighting]] !! [[Dragon Egg|Dragon]] |- | [[File:Cyndaquil.png|40px]] '''Cyndaquil''' || [[File:Chikorita.png|40px]] '''Chikorita''' || [[File:Totodile158.1.png|40px]] '''Totodile''' || [[File:Chinchou.png|40px]] Chinchou || [[File:Tyrogue.png|40px]] Tyrogue ||
--- |- | [[File:Houndour.png|40px]] '''Houndour''' || [[File:Sunkern.png|40px]] '''Sunkern''' || [[File:Wooper.png|40px]] Wooper || [[File:Mareep.png|40px]] Mareep ||
--- ||
--- |- | [[File:Slugma.png|40px]] '''Slugma''' || [[File:Hoppip.png|40px]] Hoppip || [[File:Marill.png|40px]] Marill || [[File:Elekid.png|40px]] Elekid ||

[[Dragon Egg|Dragon]] |- | [[File:Torchic.png|40px]] '''Torchic''' || [[File:Treecko.png|40px]] '''Treecko''' || [[File:Mudkip.png|40px]] '''Mudkip''' || [[File:Electrike.png|40px]] '''Electrike''' || [[File:Makuhita.png|40px]] Makuhita || [[File:Bagon.png|40px]] '''Bagon''' |- | [[File:Numel.png|40px]] Numel || [[File:Roselia.png|40px]] '''Roselia''' || [[File:Feebas.png|40px]] '''Feebas''' || [[File:Plusle.png|40px]] Plusle || [[File:Meditite.png|40px]] Meditite || [[File:Shelgon.png|40px]] Shelgon |- | || [[File:Tropius.png|40px]] Tropius || [[File:Clamperl.png|40px]] Clamperl || [[File:Minun.png|40px]] Minun || || [[File:Salamence.png|40px]] Salamence |} === '''[[Sinnoh]]''' === {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! [[Fire Egg|Fire]] !! [[Grass Egg|Grass]] !! [[Water Egg|Water]] !! [[Electric Egg|Electric]] !! [[Fighting Egg|Fighting]] !! [[Dragon Egg|Dragon]] |- | [[File:Chimchar.png|40px]] '''Chimchar''' || [[File:Turtwig.png|40px]] '''Turtwig''' || [[File:Piplup.png|40px]] '''Piplup''' || [[File:Pachirisu.png|40px]] '''Pachirisu''' || [[File:Riolu.png|40px]] '''Riolu''' || [[File:Gible.png|40px]] '''Gible''' |- | || [[File:Carnivine.png|40px]] '''Carnivine''' || [[File:Finneon.png|40px]] Finneon || [[File:Shinx.png|40px]] Shinx || || [[File:Gabite.png|40px]] Gabite |- | || [[File:Budew.png|40px]] Budew || [[File:Buizel.png|40px]] Buizel || || || [[File:Garchomp.png|40px]] Garchomp |} === '''[[Unova]]''' === {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! [[Fire Egg|Fire]] !! [[Grass Egg|Grass]] !! [[Water Egg|Water]] !! [[Electric Egg|Electric]] !! [[Fighting Egg|Fighting]] !! [[Dragon Egg|Dragon]] |- | [[File:Tepig.png|40px]] '''Tepig''' || [[File:Snivy.png|40px]] '''Snivy''' || [[File:Oshawott.png|40px]] '''Oshawott''' || [[File:Blitzle.png|40px]] '''Blitzle''' || [[File:Throh.png|40px]] '''Throh''' || [[File:Deino.png|40px]] '''Deino''' |- | [[File:Pansear.png|40px]] '''Pansear''' || [[File:Pansage.png|40px]] '''Pansage''' || [[File:Panpour.png|40px]] '''Panpour''' || || [[File:Sawk.png|40px]] '''Sawk''' || [[File:Zweilous.png|40px]] Zweilous |- | || || || || || [[File:Hydreigon.png|40px]] Hydreigon |} ==Helpful Info== When you enter the next area the Pokémon rates change. Assuming you've just entered [[Sinnoh]] the [[Water Egg]] table changes from ===In [[Hoenn]]=== (Squirtle, Lapras, Staryu, Psyduck) (Totodile, Wooper, Marill, Qwilfish) (Mudkip, Feebas, Clamperl) (Mudkip, Feebas, Clamperl) ===In [[Sinnoh]]=== (Squirtle, Lapras, Staryu, Psyduck) (Totodile, Wooper, Marill, Qwilfish) (Mudkip, Feebas, Clamperl) (Mudkip, Feebas, Clamperl) (Piplup, Finneon, Buizel) (Piplup, Finneon, Buizel) (Piplup, Finneon, Buizel) (Piplup, Finneon, Buizel) Which makes the chance of getting a Pokémon from the new region you entered 50% and dropping the total combination of all previous areas percent's down to 50% {{Eggs}}
[[Category:Eggs]]
